phrases: Please use this room.
Understood, thank you.
She is settling down in a bad spot.
The center of the three children's rooms.
To make it easier for her to watch us...
I was distracted by the tracking devices that I did not think we would get another adult.
Actually we should be happy about this.
What?
Be happy?
Carol and Sister Krone.
We have two more sources of information.
I see.
First, where did those two come from?
Carol is Conny's replacement.
So they are replenishing the merchandise.
Yeah, if this place is a farm,
they must have a site where they prepare one-year-olds for replenishment.
So did all of us come from there originally?
Probably.
And also that Sister Krone.
It is significant that there is another adult other than Mom.
There might be other farms just like here,
so are the adults who obey the demons under the control of demons from birth,
or after they are captured?
After we escape, things will change depending on that.
But first, we need to figure out how to escape with everyone.
And the location of the tracking devices.
I searched all over my body, but I did not find any traces of something implanted.
And nothing in our clothes or shoes.
Based on humankind's existing technology, it probably uses radio waves.
But that requires batteries.
Something really small that would not leave a scar, and with batteries that last over 10 years.
That kind of product would not exist in 2015.
Meaning?
It Will be difficult to predict the mechanism, find the location, and figure out how to break it.
And we might as well give up if it is technology originating from the demons.
True.
What?
So, checkmate?
Yup.
No way!
Well, even if we cannot figure it out, we can guess.
Yeah.
We have to think from the enemy's point of view.
Where and what kind of a device would be the most convenient to implant?
Carol!
Since she just arrived, she might have one.
A mark from implanting the tracking device.
Thank you for an opportunity to return to this side.
I only made a request for one assistant.
It is not like I called for you specifically.
I have heard of your many achievements.
The youngest to be selected as Mom and caretaker.
You have raised the highest number of high-quality goods among all of the plants, ever.
I am honored to work under someone I admire so much.
Lip service is not necessary.
Let us quit the small talk, and talk about work instead.
Here are the documents of my adorable children.
Memorize all of it, right now.
It should be easier than getting perfect scores every morning.
By the way, what work was I called in for?
They found out about the secret.
They also saw the package in the truck.
Then, in accordance with the rules, we must find them and ship them imm
Wait.
It is fine.
I already have an idea of who the targets are.
And that is...
Two of the oldest children.
We just have to make sure they do not escape before shipment.
My children are special.
And this is beneficial for the plant.
So you are not reporting it?
No.
I will take care of the targets in a proper manner.
You are a guard.
You do not need to think.
Just watch the children.
I am the Mom of this House.
And you are my assistant.
Understand?
Sister Krone.
Yes, madam, Isabella.
So that is how it is.
I was surprised, too.
To think that the amazing Isabella...
And she is not reporting it to the higher-ups, but trying to cover up her mistake.
However, if I help her out here, she will owe me, and I will one day have the Mom position!
Oh my, what is wrong?
You are crying so much.
Come on now, do not cry.
You would be happy too, right?
If I became a Mom?
If that happens, I will get busier, but you will support me, right?
Do not get jealous of the other children and say selfish things, okay?
Wait a minute.
Could this be my chance?
I can become a Mom!
Not one day, but now!
If I capture the children who know the secret and report her violation, Isabella will be fired!
It would be faster to pretend to obey her and then take her position away!
Capture the targets!
And then snitch!
Then immediately ship them out!
Wonderful!
I will become the Mom here.
I need to find them quickly.
The kids like her.
Yeah.
How do we outmaneuver the two adults who are liked so much?
Exactly.
The biggest concern is the report to the demons.
As soon as we escape, the monsters will come after us.
There is only one way to stop that.
Mom and Sister will have to be...
Norman and Ray, right?
Yes.
I heard you get perfect scores on the tests.
Yes.
That is amazing.
It is nice to meet you.
I hope we can get along.
Did she hear us?
No, we are fine.
I do not think that sister came here just to watch us.
What do you mean?
The way she looked at us was different.
She is probably suspecting us, the oldest among everyone.
Where did she get that information?
Is not it obvious?
From Mom.
Mom is definitely closing in on us.
We have to hurry.
Think from the enemy's point of view.
Demons will not eat the tracking device.
That means it would be in a place where it is easily remov
Emma, I...
Where?
That night...
What is that?
A bug bite?
Mom told me a while ago that this was from when blood was drawn to test for diseases.
Naila, Phil, Mark, and Conny all had it.
On everyone is ear...
Mine too?
It is already gone.
Well, of course.
I am 10, and you are 11.
Yeah.
It was way smaller than I thought.
What was?
Oh!
I meant, it was such a small scar that it had already disappeared.
Yeah.
I have to protect these kids.
Scheduled check-in.
Scheduled check-in.
This is 73584, Plant Three.
October 17th.
Everything is normal.
Now ending transmission.
Isabella?
Grandma!
I have a message from the Boss.
Those three can be shipped out as scheduled, right?
Listen, Isabella.
This year, the other plants have overall been bearing poor fruit.
Only your plant can deliver the supreme goods that will be offered at the Tifari.
Yes, I have understood that from the beginning.
Please give the Boss this message.
Everything is going fine.
You may have any child at any time.
I see.
So they can be shipped?
That would certainly please Him.
Do not mess this up.
His meal is special, and nothing like ours.
Then, my friends, let us celebrate the harvest.
And offer our prayers to Him.
Yeah, no one would notice this.
I never knew about a mark from when they took our blood.
And it is something that disappears so quickly?
Yeah.
I did not even suspect it at all this whole time.
I am sorry.
No, you did well, Emma.
We now know the location, shape, and size of the tracking device.
We can move to the next step.
After locating it...
How to break it.
What do we do?
If we cut it open to inspect it...
If Mom combs through our hair...
Yeah.
Well, putting aside to see if we can break it easily or not,
the tracking device implanted in us is not that functionally useful.
What?
They are not?
That is because the signal cannot specify the individual.
Without confirming, she cannot tell where we are.
If we get close to the gate or walls, it does not notify her.
But it is still implanted.
Yeah.
And why?
They must be confident they can come after us as long as the tracking device is intact.
Wait.
Does that mean if it does notify them, it would be when the tracking device is destroyed?
That is a possibility, too.
Meaning?
They would be notified only when it is broken, like with an alarm or something.
So if we destroy it, Mom will know immediately?
Well, if a notification function even exists.
But thinking that Mom purposely let us know about the existence of the tracking devices...
We cannot dismiss it so easily.
It is risky to mess with it and break it.
So we can only destroy it when we escape.
Then how will we figure out how to break it?
Well, for that, this shape and size brings something to mind.
Can you leave this issue to me?
Are you sure?
Yeah.
If you are saying so, then I will leave it to you.
The only thing left is taking everyone outside with us.
The problem is that everyone completely trusts Mom,
and they probably will not be able to handle the truth.
Do you think we will have to lie to them to take them outside?
There is also the problem of insufficient abilities.
In simpler terms, they are a hindrance.
Ray!
But it is the truth.
Some are not good at physical activities,
and we have babies who can hardly walk.
For that, I have an idea.
What is it?
Playing tag.
Norman is It, and everyone runs away.
We pretend it is play when we are actually training.
That way, Mom will not find out.
I will teach them how to utilize their bodies.
- As for how to utilize their brains... - Leave it to us.
Do not rush.
Think.
What can you do to escape?
Norman will not overlook things like that.
Check the wind.
Which way makes it is easier to run away?
Let us see.
Downwind.
This is cool.
I can last a lot longer than before!
Maybe I can even make it
I thought I was doing so good.
You cannot just leave your own footprints.
You have to check the opponent's footprints, too.
Really?
Yeah.
And Norman is also reading your habits.
For example, Thoma, you...
Playing tag looks like fun.
I want to get along with everyone.
So let us play tag.
The match's time limit will be 20 minutes.
I will be It.
Everyone, try to run away from me.
Seven, eight,
nine, ten!
Now, let me see what that woman's special children can do!
So, how will the enemy move?
She will probably look for us first.
And on the way, she will capture as many little ones as she can.
Probably something like that.
Fake ones?
And what is with this silence?
I will have to get serious!
She is not coming after us at all.
Did she change her strategy?
Huh?
Too bad, caught you!
Why did everyone gather in one spot?
She used these to lure in the younger ones.
So she is not stupid, huh?
No!
Listen everyone!
Sister is really hard to beat!
Don and Gilda, too?
It was crazy.
She chased me everywhere.
We got caught way faster than when Norman was It.
Emma!
Cover your mouths!
Jump!
Running while carrying two kids.
You must be tired, Emma.
You will not be able to move unless you rest.
Did you know?
Norman's weakness is physical strength.
I heard he was feeble when he was younger.
Ray's weakness is that he is a little quick to give up.
He makes a decision fast but abandons them just as quickly.
And you, Emma!
Your weakness is your naivete.
Like how naive you are by carrying others when you are being chased.
Just give up and come on out.
I will not do you wrong.
Listen, Emma.
If you saw the harvest that day...
then I am on your side.
Found you!
Two more!
How much time is left?
Eight minutes and 40 seconds!
So these are the perfect scorers of this place.
Time's up.
- They did it! - Yay!
Norman.
Ray.
Emma.
And...
That sister has not done anything since.
That is probably Mom's order.
Mom used to suspect us, but it does not seem like that anymore.
I wonder why?
What do you think, Ray?
What about you, Norman?
Mom did something behind the scenes so she will not have to move herself.
What do you mean?
What do you think would be the easiest situation for Mom?
That would be to know our moves without having to do anything.
But there are no security cameras or listening devices...
That means...
Yeah, there is probably...
Most likely among the kids.
There is a traitor.
- I am hungry! - Me too.
